ai-tha-ap294:1.3_0: In the five ways of being grasped,
ai-tha-ap294:2.1_0: Seeing the light of the world,
ai-tha-ap294:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap294:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap294:3.4_0: this is the fruit and result.
ai-tha-ap294:4.2_0: I was the one great hermit.
ai-tha-ap294:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Golden.
ai-tha-ap294:7.1_0: Seeing the second result, the Elder Nun Plaka
